DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myToolTip: Fly ingress, strafe with gun, and egress
DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Execute a call for Close Air Support (CAS) using guns.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>initialPoint</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Initial Point:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Initial Point, from which the aircraft will begin its strafing attack. If used, do not also specify IP Location.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Points</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtPointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>initialPointLocation</myVariableName> <myType>locationwithoutaltitude</myType> <myLabel>Initial Point:</myLabel> <myToolTip>Initial point to start attack from</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetPoint</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target Point:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The location of the strafing target</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Points</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtPointsFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetType</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Target Type:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The specific types of entities to target.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Any vehicles</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>None (target location);Tanks;Armored Vehicles;Any vehicles;Infantry</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>abortWithoutTarget</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Abort Without Target</myLabel> <myToolTip>If true, and no target entities are acquired, the strafing mission will abort. Otherwise, the task will fire at the target point if it can't acquire targets</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>1</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>egressManeuver</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Egress Maneuver:</myLabel> <myToolTip>The initial egress maneuver. "Juke" is a sharp S-turn before a climb.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Juke Right</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Juke Left;Immediate Climb;Juke Right</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>finalEgressHeading</myVariableName> <myType>heading</myType> <myLabel>Final Egress Heading</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>0</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>6.2831853071795862</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
